description.value: You were born with a strange blessing: bereft of the typical halfling luck, you can instead manipulate the fortunes of others. You can never take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Halfling Luck]{Halfling Luck} feat, and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Jinx]{Jinx} action.
